description: Bradey Rey decided to swing by TommyD's place to have a bit of fun today.Did they end up having fun? Oh yes, fun is an under statement. This is one of the hottest scene's Tommy says he has ever been in.It was pretty dark in the room, as Tommy wanted to put a mood onto the shoot. It really worked out; the dim lighting was perfect for such a passionate, sexy scene.So without further ado, enjoy Tommy and Bradey Rey as they suck, fuck and so much more.Have fun!
title: Tommy D In A Pasionnate Ass Ramming Scene
